import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Disclosure, RadioGroup, Tab } from '@headlessui/react' import { StarIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { HeartIcon, MinusSmIcon, PlusSmIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import axios from "axios"; import HeaderHS from "../components/HeaderHS"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function DetailProduct({ match }) { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0); const userData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user-data')); const token = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('token')); const qs = require('qs'); useEffect(() => { fetchproduct(); }, []); const fetchproduct = async () => { try { const data = await axios.get(`https://server.seafreshing.com/api/product/get-product/${match.params.id}`) let temp = data.data.product; setProduct(temp) } catch (e) { return e.response.data.msg } } // const [selectedColor, setSelectedColor] = useState(product.colors[0]) return ( <> { token ? :
} { product[0] ?

*/}
